API Client Reference

Fortinet API client library for Python.

This is the core module that provides the main functionality for interacting with Fortinet devices via their APIs.

class fortiapipy.core.APIResource(client: FortiAPIClient, path='')

Bases: object

Base API resources class.

class fortiapipy.core.FortiAPIClient(api_type: FortiAPIDeviceType, base_url: str, api_key: str, log_level: LogLevel = LogLevel.WARNING)

Bases: object

Client class for Fortinet API interactions.

fortiapipy.core.logger = <fortiapipy.logger.FortiAPILogger object>

Setup module logging. Default level is WARNING, but can be overridden as follows: logger.level = logger.DEBUG

Custom exceptions

exception fortiapipy.exceptions.FortiAPIError(status_code: int, message: str)

Bases: Exception

An exception thrown when an error occurs interacting with the API.

FORTIOS = 'fortios'
